name: Course on GOC: Basic to Advance - IIT JEE
description: Mohammad Kashif Alam will cover the topic of the GOC. All the topics will be discussed in detail and will be helpful for all aspirants preparing for the IIT JEE exam 2024. The course is for 1 month approximately with 12 sessions and the duration of each session is 90 minutes. The course will be taught in Hinglish and notes will be provided in English.

value.title: Concepts of Electron Displacement Effects: Inductive Effects
Application of Inductive Effects with Problems
Comprehensive Concepts of Resonance and Resonance Theory
All Mandatory DPPs and Doubt Clearing Session
Concepts of Resonance and Mesomeric Effects
Application of Hyperconjugation with Examples and Problems
All Mandatory DPPs and Doubt Clearing Session
All Electronic Effects in a Glance
All Mandatory DPPs and Doubt Clearing Session

author.bio: A Star faculty of IIT JEE with 11 Best Teaching Awards, Mohammad sir has been an exceptional coach to 6000 AIRs in the last 10+ years.
